methods.name: classes
methods.description: Returns the HTML classes for the component.

methods.name: titleStyle
methods.description: Returns styling for the title element.

methods.name: bodyStyle
methods.description: Returns styling for the body element.

children.description: The body of the content component.

title.description: The title of the content component.

as.description:
Applies a theme to the Content
Value: primary, secondary

inline.description: Displays the content inline with it's title.

align.description: Aligns the content (left, center or right).

titleWidth.description: Sets a custom width for the title element.

bodyFullWidth.description:
Over-rides the calculation of body width based on titleWidth
Sometimes we need the body to be full width while keeping a title width similar to other widths
